templates.title: Linuxserver Jellyfin
templates.description: Jellyfin is a Free Software Media System that puts you in control of managing and streaming your media.
templates.note: Here is an opinionated example to help you get started creating a container.

templates.title: MediaElch
templates.description: MediaElch is a MediaManager for Kodi. Information about Movies, TV Shows, Concerts and Music are stored as NFO files.
templates.note: Here is an opinionated example to help you get started creating a container.
templates.name: rveillerot_mediaelch
